reviewText: Its' the best Pat Metheny Group Dvd for me!!!

WHERE DO I BEGIN...THIS IS TRULY THE MOST AMAZING CONCERT EVER! LUCKY FOR ME I LOCATED IT ON AMAZON FROM JAPAN! IT WAS A GIFT FOR MY DEAR FRIEND MICHAEL AND IT ARRIVED RIGHT ON TIME! WE USED TO BE ABLE TO WATCH THE ENTIRE CONCERT ON YOUTUBE BUT THEN THEY TOOK IT OFF! I LOVE EVERYTHING PAT METHENY HAS EVER CREATED. HE IS A GENUIS AND THE BEST COMPOSER, PERFORMER EVER!!! HE CHANGED MY LIFE MANY YEARS AGO AS WELL AS MICHAEL'S LIFE AND WE ARE FOREVER GRATEFUL THAT GOD HAS CREATED SUCH A WONDERFUL HUMAN BEING.
